text: "Perfect Illusion" is a song recorded by American singer-songwriter Lady Gaga. It is the lead single from her fifth studio album, Joanne. The song was released on September 9, 2016. It reached the top twenty in the US, UK, Australia, and Canada. It reached number one in France and Spain. ==References== Category:Lady Gaga songs Category:2016 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Lady Gaga
title: Perfect Illusion
